name: Hard Work
overview: A difficult platformer that was released as part of the "Arcadepack" by Multisoft. Since the lust for power had blinded the perfidious Corak, leading him to enter into an agreement with the forces of evil, everything went wrong in the kingdom of Sammon. It even got to the point where the splendid Princess Lavina had fallen into a deep state of unconsciousness that would have brought her close to death. To stem the invasion of the Dark forces of evil; the sibyl told the heroic Los that she could go to the realm of darkness and with Hard Work, bring back the sacred symbols capable of restoring confidence and life to the princess and defeating the demons of Corak. Help our hero to overcome the insidious and deadly pitfalls of the kingdom of shadows and to return victorious with its precious and necessary booty. It'll be hard work, but you have everything it takes to succeed! Published in Italy as Dark Ward in New Special PlayGames n.2 (ottobre 1987) and Hit Parade C64 n.19 (Gennaio 1988).
